I'd like to be able to have a single jar file, that contains JUnit and othe=
r jar files my project needs, and be able to run my Junit tests from the cm=
d line.

In other words do something like:

>java -jar JunitTest.jar

Which=
 would execute-> junit.textui.TestRunner MyTestClass

It would need to be w=
ith junit inside the jar (not outside on the classpath somewhere).

My dire=
ctory structure looks something like this:


dist
  JUnitTest.jar
  lib
   =
  junit-3.8.2.jar


What tweaks do I need to make to the manifest?
What wil=
l the jar command look like both jarring up and executing?

Thanks.
